A '''Great Master''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is a [[Slavery|slave-trader]] from the city of [[Meereen]], on the coast of [[Slaver's Bay]]. He is played by uncredited extra [[Laurence Doherty]] and appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".<ref>[https://twitter.com/DocFourFour/status/458379621978107905/photo/1/large Laurence Doherty's twit]</ref>
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
He is one of the many [[Great Masters]] that gather over the walls of Meereen when [[Daenerys Targaryen]] and her army appear before the city gates to lay [[Siege of Meereen|siege]] to the city.<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
